## ü¶∏ Part C ‚Äî Superhero Challenge (AI Feedback)

Write your own past perfect sentences and click **Check with AI**.

```{=html}
<div id="ai-practice">

<p>1. <textarea id="s1" placeholder="Type your sentence here" style="width:100%; height:70px;"></textarea></p>
<p>2. <textarea id="s2" placeholder="Type your sentence here" style="width:100%; height:70px;"></textarea></p>
<p>3. <textarea id="s3" placeholder="Type your sentence here" style="width:100%; height:70px;"></textarea></p>
<p>4. <textarea id="s4" placeholder="Type your sentence here" style="width:100%; height:70px;"></textarea></p>
<p>5. <textarea id="s5" placeholder="Type your sentence here" style="width:100%; height:70px;"></textarea></p>

<button onclick="checkWithAI()" style="margin-top:10px;">ü§ñ Check with AI</button>

<div id="ai-feedback" style="margin-top:15px;"></div>

</div>

<script>
async function checkWithAI(){

  const sentences = [
    document.getElementById("s1").value,
    document.getElementById("s2").value,
    document.getElementById("s3").value,
    document.getElementById("s4").value,
    document.getElementById("s5").value
  ];

  document.getElementById("ai-feedback").innerHTML = "Checking... ‚è≥";

  const res = await fetch("https://YOUR-AI-ENDPOINT/check", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
    body: JSON.stringify({ sentences })
  });

  const data = await res.json();
  document.getElementById("ai-feedback").innerHTML = data.feedback;
}
</script>
```

```{=html}
<script>

function checkMCQ(btn, correct){
  const text = btn.innerText.trim();
  if(text.startsWith(correct)){
    btn.style.background = "#c8f7c5";
  }else{
    btn.style.background = "#ffd6d6";
  }
}

function checkText(id, answer){
  const input = document.getElementById(id);
  const result = document.getElementById("r"+id.replace("q",""));
  if(input.value.toLowerCase().trim() === answer){
    result.innerHTML = " ‚úÖ";
  }else{
    result.innerHTML = " ‚ùå";
  }
}

function toggleAnswers(){
  const box = document.getElementById("answers");
  box.style.display = box.style.display === "none" ? "block" : "none";
}

</script>

<style>
```
